home.title: StoryShot ‚Äì One-line Instagram story card maker
home.subtitle: Pick a photo or background and write a line for today. Create story cards for Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, or blog thumbnails.
home.introShort: StoryShot is a free tool to create one-line story cards for Instagram, KakaoTalk, and blog thumbnails and save them as PNG. Your text and photos are never sent to a server.
home.tips1: Use 9:16 ratio for Instagram stories and reels.
home.tips2: With a photo background, use the "Darken background" slider to improve text readability.
home.tips3: Saved PNGs don't include the width handle or color UI‚Äîjust the final card.
home.howToUseStep1: In the left form, enter your one-line, optional subtext, and date. Choose your mood (calm / good / tired / focused), or add a custom mood phrase or emoji.
home.howToUseStep2: Choose a gradient or photo background. For photos, use the darken slider for text readability and pick a card ratio (9:16, 4:5, 1:1, etc.).
home.howToUseStep3: On the preview card, drag text blocks to move them and click to change color. Drag the width handle (‚ñê) on the right to adjust text width.
home.howToUseStep4: When you're happy with it, click "Save card as PNG" to download. The saved image does not include the width handle or color UI.
home.uploadHint: Any image works: portraits, landscapes, screenshots, etc.
home.overlayHint: Higher values add a darker overlay so text is easier to read.

home.aboutBody: StoryShot is a web tool that lets you create one-line story cards for Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile photos, blog thumbnails, and more, then save them as PNG. Everything runs in your browser; your text and uploaded images are never sent to any server.
home.faqQ1: Where can I use the saved image?
home.faqA1: You can use it anywhere: Instagram stories, KakaoTalk profile, blog thumbnails, social posts, etc. Commercial use is fine.
home.faqQ2: Is my data stored on a server?
home.faqA2: No. This page runs entirely in your browser. Your one-line text, subtext, and uploaded photos are not sent to any server. Only when you click "Save card as PNG" does a file download to your device.
home.faqQ3: Can I change the card ratio?
home.faqA3: Yes. You can choose from 9:16 (story), 4:5, 1:1 (square), 3:2, 16:9, and other ratios in the card ratio section.
home.faqQ4: Can I move the text or change its color?
home.faqA4: Yes. On the preview card, drag a text block to move it and click it to change the text color. You can also drag the width handle (‚ñê) on the right to adjust the text width.
home.faqQ5: Can I use it on mobile?
home.faqA5: Yes. The site works in mobile browsers. Editing the card may be easier on a computer.
home.faqA6: Yes. StoryShot is free to use.
